isis.stitle: DT 466 / DT 570 / HT 570 Diesel Engine Diagnostic Manual - 2004 Emissions with EGR - Engine and Vehicle Features - Standard Features - Cold Ambient Protection (CAP)

svcproc.title: Cold Ambient Protection (CAP)
svcproc.para: CAP protects the engine from damage caused by prolonged idle at no load during cold weather. CAP also improves cab warm-up.

CAP maintains engine coolant temperature by increasing the engine rpm to a programmed value when the ambient air temperature is at or below 0 °C (32 °F) and the engine coolant temperature is below 65 °C (149 °F) while the engine has been idling with no load for more than 5 minutes.
CAP is standard on trucks without an Idle Shutdown Timer (IST).
